actions.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendments (A002) Agreed to without objection.

description: Amendments strike title I; strike sections 201-204 of the Senate bill and insert the text of H.R. 70, as passed by the House; strike section 205; strike section 206; and strike title III of the Senate bill.
purpose: An amendment consisting of several amendments, offered en bloc to do the following: 1. Strike title I of the Senate bill; 2. Strike sections 201-204 of the Senate bill and insert the text of H.R. 70, as passed by the House; 3. Strike section 205 of the Senate bill; 4. Strike section 206 of the Senate bill; 5. Strike title III of the Senate bill.
